  • Uses of IHarmonicBondPropertyCalculator in de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds

    Classes in de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.harmonicBonds that implement IHarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    HarmonicBondForceConservativeCalculator
    Harmonic bond conservative force calculator The following particle arrays are changed during accumulation process ("+-=" operations): ParticleArrays.getF_x ParticleArrays.getF_y ParticleArrays.getF_z NOTE: HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator parallelisation avoids collisions of access of particle indices thus a lock is NOT necessary.
    class 
    HarmonicBondPotentialCalculator
    Harmonic bond potential calculator NOTE: NO particle related array is changed.
    class 
    HarmonicBondPropertyCalculator
    Harmonic bond property calculator for parallelised calculation of bond chunk properties.
